statements: SELECT * FROM influencer_content_calendar;
SELECT post_title, post_date FROM influencer_content_calendar WHERE post_id = 100;
SELECT post_title, post_date, post_content FROM influencer_content_calendar WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_id, post_date, collaboration_partner FROM influencer_content_calendar WHERE collaboration_partner = 'Brand X';
SELECT post_title, collaboration_partner FROM influencer_content_calendar ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_title, post_date FROM influencer_content_calendar WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM influencer_content_calendar WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_content FROM influencer_content_calendar WHERE collaboration_partner = 'Brand X' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_title, collaboration_partner FROM influencer_content_calendar WHERE post_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT post_title, post_content, collaboration_partner FROM influencer_content_calendar WHERE post_date < '2021-12-31' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ContentCalendars ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, post_date FROM ContentCalendars WHERE collaboration_partner = 'BrandX' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM ContentCalendars;
SELECT influencer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_followers FROM Followers GROUP BY influencer_name;
SELECT influencer_name, post_date, post_content FROM ContentCalendars WHERE influencer_name = 'Alice' AND post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_name, post_date, post_content FROM ContentCalendars WHERE collaboration_partner = 'Brand A' ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT influencer_name, COUNT(calendar_id) AS total_posts FROM ContentCalendars GROUP BY influencer_name HAVING COUNT(calendar_id) > 5;
SELECT influencer_name, follow_date FROM Followers WHERE follower_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY follow_date ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_name, follow_date FROM Followers JOIN ContentCalendars ON Followers.influencer_name = ContentCalendars.influencer_name WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_followers FROM Followers GROUP BY influencer_name ORDER BY total_followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT * FROM post_schedule ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, bio FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 100000;
SELECT brand_name, collaboration_type FROM collaborations WHERE influencer_id = 2;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY influencer_name DESC
SELECT influencer_name, bio FROM influencer_profiles WHERE bio IS NOT NULL

SELECT ip.influencer_name, ps.post_content, ps.post_date FROM influencer_profiles ip JOIN post_schedule ps ON ip.influencer_id = ps.influencer_id WHERE ps.post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ps.post_date ASC
SELECT ip.influencer_name, c.brand_name, c.collaboration_type FROM influencer_profiles ip JOIN collaborations c ON ip.influencer_id = c.influencer_id WHERE c.collaboration_type = 'Sponsored'

SELECT ip.influencer_name, ps.post_content, c.brand_name, c.collaboration_type FROM influencer_profiles ip JOIN post_schedule ps ON ip.influencer_id = ps.influencer_id JOIN collaborations c ON ip.influencer_id = c.influencer_id WHERE c.brand_name = 'XYZ Brand'
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles WHERE name = 'Alice';
SELECT id, name, followers FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers > 50000;
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM posts WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT collaboration_name, start_date, end_date FROM collaborations WHERE partner_id = 2;
SELECT name, email, followers FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers > 1000
SELECT post_title, post_date, influencer_id FROM posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT collaboration_name, start_date, end_date FROM collaborations WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT collaboration_name, collaboration_description, influencer_id, partner_id FROM collaborations WHERE start_date <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles
SELECT * FROM post_schedule ORDER BY post_datetime DESC
SELECT brand_name, collaboration_type FROM collaboration_requests WHERE influencer_id = 101
SELECT campaign_name, engagement_rate FROM campaign_performance WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM influencer_contacts
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY influencer_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT post_content FROM post_schedule WHERE influencer_id = 12345;
SELECT influencer_name, brand_name FROM collaboration_requests JOIN influencer_profiles ON collaboration_requests.influencer_id = influencer_profiles.influencer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, engagement_rate FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
